projects.name: Savo - A Course Recommendation platform
projects.short: Developed a platform using Django, Html, CSS, Js, ML, AI, AWS, Automation that recommends and shows courses from major websites like YouTube, Udemy, etc.

projects.name: PayBae - Money Simplifying app
projects.short: Contributed to the development of a mobile application using Flutter and Django, with PostgreSQL as the database. Implemented features such as account creation, transaction history, and notification alerts.

projects.name: Aishika - A CBT Bot
projects.short: Developed a Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) chatbot using Python, NLP, Neural Networks, and Tkinter. Implemented a question-answering system that responds to the user's queries, assesses their mood, and offers personalized advice.

projects.name: Covid detection using VGG-16
projects.short: Built a model using Deep Learning and VGG-16 architecture to detect COVID-19 in lung X-ray images with 83% accuracy.
